message.content:
1. Body mass index was measured in both case and control groups.
2. Waist circumference was measured in both case and control groups.
3. Buttock circumference was measured in both case and control groups.
4. Abdominal fat thickness was measured in both case and control groups.
5. These measurements were taken at the participants' first visit.
6. These measurements were again taken at 2 weeks after the first visit.
7. These measurements were again taken at 4 weeks after the first visit.
8. These measurements were again taken at 6 weeks after the first visit.

messages.content:
Statement: Body mass index, waist and buttock circumference, and abdominal fat thickness were measured in both case and control groups at their first visit and then at the next 2, 4, and 6 weeks.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
